name: SPACECRUSHER
description:
SPACECRUSHER is a tribute to the kaiju movies like Godzilla, Gamera or Daimajin, you are the monster and your goal is to destroy the city !

It's free, but i will release more levels for the game continuously, so if you like this game, you can support me by buying it !

CONTROLS :

ZQSD / WASD to move

F to roar

Left click to punch

Right click to shoot laser
